Text: A universal remote is a remote control that can be programmed to operate various brands of one or more types of consumer electronics devices.

Text: Universal remote:  Low-end universal remotes can only control a set number of devices determined by their manufacturer, while mid- and high-end universal remotes allow the user to program in new control codes to the remote.
